subject: Concerning Samurai clothing
msgSnippet: I would like to know if samurai had to wear Hakama or was it by rank or preference? Or was it so that if they didn t follow bushido then they didn t wear them?

I would like to know if samurai had to wear Hakama or was it by rank 
or preference? Or was it so that if they didn't follow bushido then 
they didn't wear them?
